variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-galaxy-containers
dependencies.description:
The Galaxy containers module - interfaces for modeling and interacting
with container backends (docker and docker swarm currently).

dependencies.name: py-lxml
dependencies.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-sortedcontainers
dependencies.description:
Sorted Containers is an Apache2 licensed sorted collections library,
written in pure-Python, and fast as C-extensions.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools
dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.

dependent_to.name: py-pulsar-galaxy-lib
dependent_to.description:
Distributed job execution application built for Galaxy
(http://galaxyproject.org/).
